short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pinterest ninja to supercharge your pinterest experience. Download and export data you see.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download media files from pinterest. Whether you search, go to home feed or inside a board whether you see a pin you can download the media file. This extension is free and forever will be free enabling thousands of users and social media influencers step up further creating more engaging and useful contents for the community and for our future to come.

This extension can:

ðŸ‘‰ .... anyone where you can see the pin list; you can download it.


This extension is free and always will be free. This is still under development and more features are coming. To make this happen we need your support. Support us via: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/adulqadir
